text.section:
Sec. 25A-1. Creation of Trust.
There is hereby created and established by authority of Chapter 73-102, Laws of Florida 1973, as an agency and instrumentality of Miami-Dade County, a revocable statutory trust the terms of which may be modified by Miami-Dade County, which Trust shall be named and known as the "Public Health Trust of Miami-Dade County, Florida" (hereinafter also referred to as the "Trust"). The Trust shall be a public body corporate and politic which, through its governing body, may exercise all those powers either specifically granted herein or necessary in the exercise of those powers herein enumerated.
